head: Blender
p: is a free and open-source 3D computer graphics software toolset used for creating animated films and computer games date of release : 1994

head: Daz Studio
p: it is a 3D-content and software company specializing in providing rigged 3D human models date of release : 2000

head: SketchUp
p: SketchUp is a 3D modeling computer program for a broad range of drawing and design applications date of release : 2000

head: Fusion 360
p: is a cloud-based 3D modeling, CAD, CAM, and PCB software platform for product design and manufacturing date of release : 2013

head: Houdini
p: Houdini is a 3D animation software application developed by Toronto-based SideFX date of release : 2020

head: Rocket 3Fr
p: is Free Windows based Polygonal Modeller for Concept Artists and Designers Modeling date of release : 2021

head: Wings 3D
p: Wings 3D is a free and open-source subdivision modeler inspired by Nendo and Mirai date of release : 2021

head: Unreal Engine
p: Unreal is a 3D computer graphics game engine developed by Epic Games date of release : 1998

head: unity
p: Unity is a cross-platform game engine developed by Unity Technologies date of release : 2005
